description: Expand the decide tool with 5 additional frameworks: Eisenhower Matrix, Cost-Benefit Analysis, Risk Assessment Matrix, Reversibility Analysis, and Regret Minimization Framework

phases.name: Core Data Model Extensions
phases.description: Extend interfaces and types to support the 5 new decision frameworks

subtasks.title: Add new analysis types to interfaces
subtasks.description: Extend the analysisType enum in src/models/interfaces.ts to include: 'eisenhower-matrix', 'cost-benefit', 'risk-assessment', 'reversibility', 'regret-minimization'
subtasks.notes: Successfully extended analysisType enum in src/models/interfaces.ts to include all 5 new decision frameworks: eisenhower-matrix, cost-benefit, risk-assessment, reversibility, and regret-minimization

subtasks.title: Create Eisenhower Matrix data structures
subtasks.description: Add EisenhowerQuadrant type and EisenhowerClassification interface with urgency/importance ratings for options
subtasks.notes: Successfully added EisenhowerQuadrant type with 4 quadrants (do-first, schedule, delegate, eliminate) and EisenhowerClassification interface with optionId, urgency, importance, and quadrant properties in src/models/interfaces.ts

subtasks.title: Create Cost-Benefit Analysis data structures
subtasks.description: Add CostBenefitItem interface with quantified monetary/non-monetary costs and benefits, net value calculations
subtasks.notes:
Successfully added Cost-Benefit Analysis data structures to src/models/interfaces.ts including:
- CostBenefitType: type enum for monetary/non-monetary classification
- CostBenefitItem: interface for individual cost or benefit items with optionId, description, amount, type, and optional category/timeframe
- CostBenefitAnalysis: interface for complete analysis with costs array, benefits array, netValue, and optional benefitCostRatio, ROI, discountRate, timePeriodYears, and NPV calculations

subtasks.title: Create Risk Assessment Matrix data structures
subtasks.description: Add RiskItem interface with probability, impact, risk score (probability x impact), and mitigation strategies
subtasks.notes: Successfully added RiskItem interface to src/models/interfaces.ts with all required fields: optionId, description, probability, impact, riskScore (probability × impact), and optional category and mitigation strategies array. Follows existing code patterns and integrates cleanly with other decision framework types.

subtasks.title: Create Reversibility Analysis data structures
subtasks.description: Add ReversibilityData interface with reversibility score, undo cost, time to reverse, and one-way/two-way door classification
subtasks.notes: Successfully added ReversibilityData interface to src/models/interfaces.ts with all required fields: optionId, reversibilityScore (number), undoCost (number), timeToReverse (number), doorType (DoorType enum with 'one-way' and 'two-way' values), and optional undoComplexity and reversibilityNotes fields. Also added DoorType type definition following existing code patterns.

subtasks.title: Create Regret Minimization data structures
subtasks.description: Add RegretMinimizationData interface with future self perspective, potential regrets at 10 min/10 months/10 years, and time-horizon analysis
subtasks.notes:
Successfully added RegretMinimizationData interface to src/models/interfaces.ts with all required fields:
- TimeHorizonRegret interface with tenMinutes, tenMonths, and tenYears properties for the 10/10/10 framework
- RegretMinimizationData interface with optionId, futureSelfPerspective, potentialRegrets (TimeHorizonRegret), and optional regretScore and timeHorizonAnalysis fields
Follows existing code patterns and integrates cleanly with other decision framework types.

phases.name: DecideServer Implementation
phases.description: Implement the server-side logic for processing and formatting the new frameworks

subtasks.title: Implement Eisenhower Matrix formatting
subtasks.description: Add formatEisenhowerMatrix method to DecideServer that displays 4 quadrants: Do First (urgent+important), Schedule (important), Delegate (urgent), Eliminate (neither)
subtasks.notes:
Successfully implemented formatEisenhowerMatrix method in DecideServer:
- Added eisenhowerClassification field to DecisionFrameworkData interface for storing urgency/importance ratings
- Created formatEisenhowerMatrix method that organizes options into 4 quadrants (Do First, Schedule, Delegate, Eliminate)
- Updated formatOutput to route eisenhower-matrix analysis type to the new formatter
- Implemented color-coded display with emojis (🔴 red for Do First, 🟢 green for Schedule, 🟡 yellow for Delegate, ⚪ gray for Eliminate)
- Each quadrant displays option name, description, and urgency/importance scores
- Follows existing DecideServer patterns with chalk-based formatting

subtasks.title: Implement Cost-Benefit Analysis formatting
subtasks.description: Add formatCostBenefitAnalysis method with quantified costs, benefits, NPV calculations, ROI display, and benefit-cost ratio
subtasks.notes:
Successfully implemented formatCostBenefitAnalysis method in DecideServer:
- Added costBenefitAnalysis field to DecisionFrameworkData interface for storing cost-benefit data
- Created formatCostBenefitAnalysis method that displays costs and benefits with detailed breakdowns
- Updated formatOutput to route cost-benefit analysis type to the new formatter
- Implemented color-coded display with emojis (💵 for monetary, ⚖️ for non-monetary)
- Shows costs section with individual items, categories, timeframes, and totals
- Shows benefits section with individual items, categories, timeframes, and totals
- Displays summary metrics: Net Value, Benefit-Cost Ratio, ROI, and NPV (with discount rate and time period)
- Color coding: green for positive values, red for negative values
- Follows existing DecideServer patterns with chalk-based formatting

subtasks.title: Implement Risk Assessment Matrix formatting
subtasks.description: Add formatRiskAssessment method displaying probability x impact matrix with color-coded risk levels (low/medium/high/critical)
subtasks.notes:
Successfully implemented formatRiskAssessment method in DecideServer:
- Added riskAssessment field to DecisionFrameworkData interface for storing risk items
- Created formatRiskAssessment method that displays probability x impact matrix with color-coded risk levels
- Updated formatOutput to route risk-assessment analysis type to the new formatter
- Implemented color-coded display with emojis (🔴 CRITICAL for score ≥7, 🟠 HIGH for score ≥4, 🟡 MEDIUM for score ≥2, 🟢 LOW for score <2)
- Each risk shows description, probability (0-100%), impact (1-10), risk score (probability × impact), and optional category
- Displays mitigation strategies when provided
- Shows risk summary per option: total risks, critical/high count, average/max risk scores
- Includes risk matrix visualization showing probability vs impact grid
- Follows existing DecideServer patterns with chalk-based formatting

subtasks.title: Implement Reversibility Analysis formatting
subtasks.description: Add formatReversibilityAnalysis method showing one-way/two-way door classification, undo costs, and decision speed recommendations

subtasks.title: Implement Regret Minimization formatting
subtasks.description: Add formatRegretMinimization method showing 10/10/10 analysis (10 min, 10 months, 10 years) and projected regrets from future self perspective

subtasks.title: Update formatOutput to route to framework handlers
subtasks.description: Modify formatOutput to detect analysisType and call the appropriate framework-specific formatter based on the analysis type

phases.name: Tool Schema Updates
phases.description: Update the MCP tool definition in index.ts with new analysis types and input schemas

subtasks.title: Update DECIDE_TOOL analysisType enum
subtasks.description: Add the 5 new analysis types to the inputSchema enum: eisenhower-matrix, cost-benefit, risk-assessment, reversibility, regret-minimization

subtasks.title: Add Eisenhower Matrix input properties
subtasks.description: Add eisenhowerClassification array property to inputSchema for urgency (1-5) and importance (1-5) ratings per option

subtasks.title: Add Cost-Benefit input properties
subtasks.description: Add costBenefitAnalysis property with costs array (item, amount, type), benefits array, discount rate, and time period

subtasks.title: Add Risk Assessment input properties
subtasks.description: Add riskAssessment property with risks array containing probability (0-1), impact (1-10), category, and mitigation fields

subtasks.title: Add Reversibility input properties
subtasks.description: Add reversibilityAnalysis property with reversibilityScore (0-1), undoCost, timeToReverse, and doorType (one-way/two-way)

subtasks.title: Add Regret Minimization input properties
subtasks.description: Add regretAnalysis property with timeHorizons (10min, 10months, 10years), projectedRegrets, and futureValues

subtasks.title: Update tool description with framework guidance
subtasks.description: Expand DECIDE_TOOL description to document when each of the 10 frameworks is most appropriate with usage examples

phases.name: Testing
phases.description: Create comprehensive tests for all new decision frameworks with realistic scenarios

subtasks.title: Test Eisenhower Matrix framework
subtasks.description: Add tests for Eisenhower Matrix with task prioritization scenarios - verify 4 quadrant classification works correctly

subtasks.title: Test Cost-Benefit Analysis framework
subtasks.description: Add tests for CBA with quantitative inputs - verify cost/benefit calculations, NPV, and ROI computations

subtasks.title: Test Risk Assessment Matrix framework
subtasks.description: Add tests for risk assessment - verify probability x impact scoring and risk level categorization

subtasks.title: Test Reversibility Analysis framework
subtasks.description: Add tests for reversibility with one-way and two-way door decision scenarios

subtasks.title: Test Regret Minimization framework
subtasks.description: Add tests for regret minimization with future perspective scenarios and 10/10/10 analysis

subtasks.title: Run full test suite and verify
subtasks.description: Execute npm test and ensure all existing and new tests pass without regression

phases.name: Web Library Updates
phases.description: Update web library schemas and demo data for the new frameworks

subtasks.title: Update web decide schema
subtasks.description: Extend analysisTypeEnum with 5 new types and add Zod schemas for framework-specific optional properties

subtasks.title: Update demo data types
subtasks.description: Extend AnalysisType union and add TypeScript interfaces for each framework's specific data in demo

phases.name: Build and Verification
phases.description: Final build verification and integration testing

subtasks.title: Build project
subtasks.description: Run npm run build to ensure TypeScript compiles without errors

subtasks.title: Verify MCP tool availability
subtasks.description: Check that the updated decide tool loads correctly with all 10 analysis types in the MCP server

acceptanceCriteria: Eisenhower Matrix categorizes options into 4 quadrants (Do First, Schedule, Delegate, Eliminate)
Cost-Benefit Analysis supports quantitative inputs with NPV and ROI calculations
Risk Assessment outputs probability x impact matrices with risk levels
Documentation explains when each framework is most appropriate
All frameworks tested with realistic decision scenarios
